author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT INVESTIGATING MAJOR HURRICANE MELISSA... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF JAMAICA AND SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA THROUGH MIDWEEK...
summary: ...AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT INVESTIGATING MAJOR HURRICANE MELISSA... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF JAMAICA AND SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA THROUGH MIDWEEK... As of 2:00 PM EDT Sun Oct 26 the center of Melissa was located near 16.4, -76.9 with movement W at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 946 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT INVESTIGATING MAJOR HURRICANE MELISSA... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF JAMAICA AND SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA THROUGH MIDWEEK... As of 2:00 PM EDT Sun Oct 26 the center of Melissa was located near 16.4, -76.9 with movement W at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 946 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
